suspect.describe: The information provided is insuffient to justify that player is cheating. However, there is still unordinary activity lies inside it. The player status will be changed to comfirmed cheater if more evidence is provided.

innocent.describe: From infromation provided, there is enough evidence to prove that player is not cheating.

discuss.describe: More discussion bettween admins and player is needed, currently uncertain.

guilt.describe: A admin has judged that player is a cheater. The result will be pubished when more admins enter the vote.

kill.describe: admins think this player is a comfirmed cheater.

invalid.describe: Invild evidence or wrong player ID

tip.notFound: Oh no, address has not been found

form.showOriginDescribe: Allow your binded orgin account to be shown on BFBAN
form.allowDMdescribe: Allow recieving DM from another people. For more massage please go to [Massage list]
form.languageSyncDescribe: This option enable website to synchronise your system's local language after logging in and will revert to the local program's persistent language if you log out

modifyName.title: Change name
modifyName.specification1: You are changing your account name, which means that you will see changes within the site and the login ID will change at the same time. If you accidentally forget your new account ID, you may not be able to retrieve it, affecting your binded orgin account, and you will need to go through a very long manual review..
modifyName.specification2: Do you understand the instructions above?
modifyName.residueDegree: You still have {changeNameLeft}chance to change name

appeal.describe: This report has problem. I can prove myself or help other to prove innocence.

placeholder.content: Please fill in detail of your appeal for review

app_qr.title: View on phone
app_qr.tip: Scan this QR code in BFBAN APP
app_qr.openAppDescribe: View this player in BFBAN APP

info.discription1: If you found could not visit battlefieldtracker or he changed Origin ID,please Click
info.discription2: bfban.com can track hackers' newest ID
info.discription3: Server can update hacker who is on the list periodically
info.discription4: Historical ID which they used before can be found too
info.agreeJudgement: Agree and confirm this player is a cheater
info.replyManual1: If you have new picture or video evidence to be maintained, you can report one more time.Otherwise,you can only reply text or link by replying here.if you want to add picture click here
info.replyManual2: and then copy the picture link to reply
info.replyManual3: You must be a BFban member to take part in the disscusion
info.appealManual1: Ban Appeals: Please send this case's web page link and appealing to ban-appeals@bfban.com.
info.adminManual1: Do not judge lightly. If you are not certain, please use the reply function above and waiting for more evidence
info.adminManual2: any action here by admin will make a status change for this reported playerÔºåIf you are not 100% confirmed, please use reply function above
info.replyManual4: You must log in to reply

fastReplies.evidencePic: As the evidence showed in the picture
fastReplies.evidenceVid: As the evidence showed in the video

messages.pleaseExplain: Please explian your decision in details

info.notFoundHintQuestion1: But I've just met him in game/I can find him on battlefield tracker?
info.notFoundHintAnswer1: Please visit origin.com to search that player. If this player can be found but the report can't be made, you can send us bug report via the contact methods on the bottom of the frontpage.
info.notFoundHintQuestion2: I can't find him on origin, what can I do?
info.notFoundHintAnswer2: That is probably because EA didnot update their database in timeÔºåor their system bugged, and we are unable to help them fix that bug. If you do wish to help, you can visit       https://answers.ea.com/t5/Origin-Client-Web-Technical/bd-p/origin-technical-issues-en       , the official froum to send bug reportÔºåyou can describe this situation as: I can't search my friend by name on origin.
info.reportNews: We offer the function to report BFV hackers!
info.idNotion1: You can only report one ID at a timeÔºå do not include the platoon name and do not fill in your own ID
info.idNotion2: Origin ID has no match for lower case and upper caseÔºåbut you must identify i I 1 l L o O 0 in order to offer correct ID
info.uploadManual1: if you do not want to register video-site member such as Bilibili and Youtube, you can go to
info.uploadManual2: and then paste the video link below
info.uploadManual3: you can offer your video by Bilibili,Youtube,Youku,Tudou and more
info.uploadPic1: We recommend you to upload pictures with png, jpg, jpeg, gif format.
info.uploadPic2: picture larger than 2M will fail to upload ,you can go to
info.uploadPic3: and then choose Image URL TagÔºåpaste the image link below
info.uploadPic4: please list your evidence hereÔºåText editor offer image upload serviceÔºàSize limits:2MÔºâ
info.description: List as much evidence as possible about the person being reported
info.onlyOneId: Only one origin ID at a time
info.loginExpired: Your login has expired, please re-login.

error.mediaEvidence: Please upload a picture or fill in the video link

activity.title: Activity
activity.description: bfban.com was made on the 4th of november 2018 and received {report} reports, and has a total of {cheater} banned hackers. Thanks for the hard work everyone!

about.title: About
about.description:
BFBAN

created at 2018.1.29; It is an organisation created to fight against hackers

Staff members in bfban include:

  • Server owners
  • Clan's leaders
  • Bf1 streamers
about.website:
bfban.com website

bfban.com relies on bfban Bureau of Investigations, the original idea originated from enthusiastic players, it is developed by mygoare and launched on November 4, 2018

Bfban is mainly used to report players and discuss if a player is a hacker or not.
about.privacy:
Privacy policy

It is open-sourced. You can post issues and suggest changes/improvements via GitHub. The API is provided by the community network and is open for public use.

account.title: User info

account.hint2: Everyone can post responses on the report page.
account.hint3: If you have more evidence for a hacker, please report the same id twice.
